extendedInfo.description: Blast Trivia, Android's premier social trivia game - and the only one with picture questions!  Compete against yourself, your friends, and the world in this frantic game of multiple choice.  Expand your knowledge while collecting badges and climbing the leaderboards.  Free to download and free to play with new categories and questions added daily.  Submit your own questions to quiz the world!  Now with multiplayer mode and a brand new "short" game board for short bursts of gaming on the go.You're sure to be an instant fan of Blast Trivia if you enjoy popular TV game shows such as Jeopardy, Deal or No Deal, or Who Wants to be a Millionaire!Having trouble?  Try the Blast Trivia forum: http://www.firecrackersw.com/forums/viewforum.php?f=3By clicking "Install" you agree to the License Agreement terms at http://firecrackersw.com/games/blast-trivia/blast-trivia-eula/

reviews.title: This is a very good trivia game.
reviews.comment: The best I\'ve played. Def worth the no ad upgrade. Love the multiplayer ability and the ranking system. Only a 4 because they don\'t respond when you contact them and they could use more variety in their categories.
reviews.author: Barbara Ward

reviews.comment: It was a fun game but it stopped letting me play. I can\'t get in.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mr Dave
reviews.comment: Very enjoyable. Not only a way to pass time, but learn things in the process. Nicely done except for the commercials. Withou them a five.  You made commercials or adds bearable and are showing correct answers. I bumped you up. Superb!
reviews.author: David Rudden

reviews.title: Decent but....
reviews.comment: You really need to put a time limit on games. Force resign people if they don\'t finish their round by a certain number of days. I currently have 7 games that I\'ve been waiting for my opponents to finish for weeks now. I\'m spanking them all and they just let their end sit because they don\'t want the loss. Bullshit. Own up. Words with friends gives you a loss if you stop playing so take a cue from them and update please. 5 stars when it happens.
reviews.author: Matthew Ecker

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Great Jeopardy style game that\'s fun to play. Did the developer of this game graduate from Missouri State University in Springfield, MO? I came across a ? about the University while playing the game and it was kind of fun to see a ? about my home town and a place that I live within walking distance of. : )
reviews.author: Rebekah Armstrong

reviews.title: Wrong url browser
reviews.comment: I want to play and it won\'t let me..freaking sucks, waited all that time for it to download and it doesn\'t even download
reviews.author: Brittany Spencer

reviews.title: Stalled Games
reviews.comment: Multiplayer games. Do they expire if the other person doesn\'t play for a certain period of time?
reviews.author: Dustin Presley

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: It is fun to play but it needs more categories and some questions repeat by far too often. It also has spelling errors. There are a lot of ads but they are fairly easy to skip.
reviews.author: Sergio Fuentes

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Its a fun game ads suck on the free version don\'t think I like it enough to buy
reviews.author: Donna Stephenson

reviews.comment: Very fun,but there should be a time limit from start to finish....i keep waiting for opponents
reviews.author: Richard Rodriguez

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Fun to play and great mix of difficulty.
reviews.author: David Floyd

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: If you want a trivia game that has incorrect answers and misspelled words, then this game is for you! Simply awful.
reviews.author: Jaki Bee

reviews.title: Educational!
reviews.comment: Great game! Love that they give you the correct answers even if you select wrong. There are some typos and also duplicate answers for some questions. There are also some questions that have the same answer as two different choices and will mark it wrong if you don\'t pick the \"correct\" one. Also, a lot of the same questions. It doesn\'t stop me from playing all the time, though!
reviews.author: Sarah Bryan

reviews.comment: It took forever to load n then it foreclosed wat a waste of time ;(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Didn\'t record rounds score
reviews.comment: Kinda buggy, recorded my round 3 score as zero even though I only missed 1 question. Now my girlfriend thinks she won, this is bullshit.
reviews.author: Adam Corcoran

reviews.title: Good way to pass the time and sharpen the mind
reviews.comment: Needs more content
reviews.author: Craig Hatcher

reviews.title: AWESOME
reviews.comment: I love this game its challenging  but  I learn ALOT of new things !I LOVE THiS GAME!!!!!!
reviews.author: Jalynn Southall

reviews.title: Multiplayer mode doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Game is fun. Leisurely way to pass the time and questions aren\'t too difficult but difficult enough for a challenge. Can add your own questions but you don\'t know if they actually use them. Would b a nice touch if they said it was approved. Multiplayer mode always freezes my phone. I actually need to force the phone to turn off if i try to play with other people.
reviews.author: Lisa G.

reviews.title: good game
reviews.comment: great but some question too long
reviews.author: Reeta K

reviews.title: I like it
reviews.comment: Not my all time favorite,  but enjoyable. I wish there were more categories and competitive play.
reviews.author: Leslie Cannata Nance
